title: Codes used by the kaskuser in kilas-balik perkembangan film independen thread
abstract: This study is a sociolinguistics study about codes which are used by the KasKuser in Kilas-balik perkembangan film independe thread. From this study, the writer wants to find out the code used in the KasKus forum. In addition, the writer wants to finds out the most frequently used code in the KasKus forum. The writer used the theory of code choice by Holmes (2001) as the reference of the code choice. In addition, the writer used the theory of characteristics of standard Indonesian code by Kushartanti (2006) and the characteristics of non-standard Indonesian theory by Riasa (2002) to determine the differences between a formal and non-formal Indonesian code. I used quantitative-descriptive approach in conducting this study. I found four codes that are used by the KasKuser, namely: Formal Indonesian code, Non-formal Indonesian code, English code, and the other code. I also found the formal Indonesian code is the most frequently used.
